title: Spectate games not working on new client
body: Title. Spectating games on the old client works fine, just not on the new client at the moment. Will the spectate game feature be brought back anytime soon?

replies.body: Should be available pretty soon, patch notes say it should be enabled during this patch

> [{quoted}](name=Fisherman Fízz,realm=EUW,application-id=2E4zVIwd,discussion-id=0IxXO2ij,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-12-09T14:54:08.297+0000)
>
> Should be available pretty soon, patch notes say it should be enabled during this patch
Wow I guess riot really does just use copy and pasted responses............
Well, do you really need a unique message to say the same thing?
I meant it as sarcasm.    I found it quite refreshing for a Rioter to just quote another person
